__e: Eighteen years- - not a word, not a letter, not a fucking call.
Eighteen years later, the kid comes and he writes a book about you saying how much of a jackass you are.
Tell them to stop it. I hadn't said a word for 18 years till he came along.
He did the identical crime 18 months before he murdered his wife.
Uh, 12 to 18 months from now, depending on good behavior.
